sense.def:
Z besedo
some
izrazimo nedoločeno količino nečesa ali nedoločeno število oseb ali stvari.

seg.quote: She had a piece of pie and some coffee.
I've got some friends coming over.
‘You'll need graph paper.’—‘Yeah, I've got some at home.’

sense.def:
Z besedo
some
tudi poudarimo, da je količina ali število precej veliko.

seg.quote: They were having some difficulty in following the plot.
I did not meet her again for some years.

sense.def:
Beseda
some
pomeni tudi del neke količine ali skupine.

seg.quote: She took some of the meat out.

sense.def:
Kadar besedo
some
uporabimo ob besedi za osebo ali stvar, tisto osebo ali stvar omenjamo nedoločno in ne povemo natančno, koga ali kaj konkretno mislimo.

seg.quote: We found it lying in some ditch in the middle of the desert.
At some stage in your career you may need my help.
...a single layer of stone, some four metres thick.
